response.original_title: The Adventurous Adventures of One Direction 2
response.overview: Mark Parsons starts off talking. In the first scene of the film, the boys are all eating breakfast. Harry tries to find his own doll in the boxes of Tac-O cereal. Zayn has come back from the garbage chute where he has been trapped in the Wrathosphere for the last nine months. Liam tells the boys about his fear of spoons. Harry and Niall go off on dates with Sarah (an old woman) and Natalie (a yawning girl), respectively. Zayn and Louis accidentally scares Liam off with a spoon. Louis then goes to get a tissue for his bleeding nose, as Zayn is called away to Psymon. Megafan is trying to kidnap the boys, or he will change the weather and destroy the planet.
response.title: The Adventurous Adventures of One Direction 2
